original_text:
The Lord has made known his salvation;
    he has revealed his righteousness in the sight of the nations.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 구원을 알게 하시며 그의 공의를 뭇 나라의 목전에서 명백히 나타내셨도다

sentences.original_text: The Lord has made known his salvation
he has revealed his righteousness in the sight of the nations
sentences.korean_translation: 그분께서 그의 의를 열방 앞에 드러내셨다
